prompt:

    "end": "00:01:34,858",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "It smells so good."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:01:38,358",
    "end": "00:01:41,258",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "We need to put this as our cover,"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:01:41,258",
    "end": "00:01:42,398",
    "lang": "en",

